title-english: Women in the Life of the Modern World
creator: Shafik, Doria
description-english: In this article the author maintains that women can play a crucial role in the modern world. Everything we read in the press proves that allowing women to engage in global activities would guarantee great results.
description-arabic: تتحدث هذه المقالة عن أن المرأة لها دور كبير وفعال في مجتمعنا وعالمنا الحديث، فكل ما تنقله الصحف يؤكد أن تمكين المرأة من المساهمة في الأعمال العالمية الكبرى يضمن نتائج باهرة.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Women in the Life of the Modern World
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
